itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Former Green Beret Sean “Buck” Rogers joins the show to talk about his new book, ‘Rising Above: A Green Beret's Story of Childhood Trauma and Ultimate Healing’ — plus Sean discusses his shocking childhood and why he left the Denver Police Department afte...
itunes:summary:
Former Green Beret Sean “Buck” Rogers joins the show to talk about his new book, ‘Rising Above: A Green Beret's Story of Childhood Trauma and Ultimate Healing’ — plus Sean discusses his shocking childhood and why he left the Denver Police Department after the George Floyd protests.
